items.sentence: Tom was already dead when the ambulance arrived.
Tom was arrested for being drunk and disorderly.
Tom was born in Boston and he grew up in Boston.
Tom was bullied at school because of his weight.
Tom was carrying a duffel bag and a guitar case.
Who\'s the lady that just came through the door?
Tom can tell me what happened when he gets here.
Tickets aren\'t required for tonight\'s concert.
I\'ll tell you everything that you want to know.
I bought this bicycle for three hundred dollars.
I can see some people walking across the street.
I really thought that Tom would change his mind.
I really thought that Tom would have to do that.
I really want to learn to speak French fluently.
You\'re the only one who can do it, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only one who does that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only person I know that can\'t swim.
You\'re three years older than Tom, aren\'t you?
Tom did the opposite of what he was asked to do.
It\'ll take three hours to finish these repairs.
